info.title: The Water Linked Underwater GPS API
info.description:
API for the Water Linked Underwater GPS. For more details: http://www.waterlinked.com

Recommended approach for connecting to a Underwater GPS via the API is:
- If "GET /api/" times out, the Underwater GPS is not running (on this IP address)
- If "GET /api/" responds with 200 OK check that the api version returrned (eg "v1") is supported by the client (eg: also supports "v1").
- If the api version returned does not match what the client supports: give an error to the user and recommend upgrading. (Eg: response is "v2" while client only supports "v1")
- If "GET /api/" responds with 301 Moved permanently. "GET /api/v1/version" to check if the kit has a version earlier than 1.5.
- "GET /api/v1/version" will always respond with 200 OK on Underwater GPS earlier than 1.5 release.

Configuration API is is not considered stable and will potentially be changed

post.description: Reset all settings on master electronics

get.description: Get current IMU and GPS status

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: Configuration parameters for antenna set up

get.description: (Re)Load current receiver settings and return them

put.description: Modify receiver configuration, does not apply the change until generic modify is called. Calling list will discard changes
Set depth from external source. If Locator A1 is used, this is required to get a position

get.description: [DEPRECATED]Get rotation and acceleration of vehicle Locator is mounted on which was previously set

put.description: [DEPRECATED]Set rotation and acceleration of vehicle Locator is mounted on. This is used to improve positioning of vehicle

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: Set current rotation and acceleration of vehicle

put.description: Set current global position of master electronics from external source. Values are only used if GPS mode is set to use external GPS

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: Global master position from external source

get.description: Get orientation of Vehicle/ROV/Locator set by SetOrientation

put.description: Set orientation/compass heading of Vehicle/ROV/Locator. This is used only for visualization in GUI

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: Set current compass heading of ROV/locator

get.description: Get current Kalman filtered acoustic position relative to master acoustics. Expected update frequency: 4 Hz
Get current unfiltered acoustic position relative to master acoustics. Expected update frequency: 4 Hz
Get current global position of locator. Locator position is calculated from the current acoustic position and the global position of the master electronics. Expected update frequency: 4 Hz
Get current global position of master electronics. Expected update frequency: 1 Hz
Get list of status reports from all status groups

ModifyAntennaConfigConfigPayload.title: ModifyAntennaConfigConfigPayload

antenna_rotation.description: Configured rotation of antenna relative to forward arrow on topside housing. Clockwise is positive direction (degrees)

x.description: Configured f position relative to master electronics (meter)

y.description: Configured Y position relative to master electronics (meter)

ModifyAntennaConfigConfigPayload.description: Configuration parameters for antenna set up

external_pps_enabled.description: Enable external PPS input to master

search_direction.description: Direction of circular search area section

search_sector.description: Sector angle of circular search area

speed_of_sound.description: Speed of sound use by the system

static_lat.description: Latitude to use in static mode

static_lon.description: Longitude to use in static mode

static_orientation.description: Orientation/compass reading to use in static mode (degrees)

x.description: Configured X position relative to master electronics (meter)

y.description: Configured Y position relative to master electronics (meter)

z.description: Configured Z position relative to master electronics (meter)

mode.description: Which mode should the WiFi be in?

password.description: Password to use for WiFi in Client mode

ssid.description: WIFI SSID to use for WiFi in Client mode

SetMasterExternalPayload.title: SetMasterExternalPayload

cog.description: Course over ground (degrees). -1 means no data.

hdop.description: Horizontal dilution of precision. -1 means no data.

numsats.description: Number of satellites. -1 means no data.

sog.description: Speed over ground (km/h). -1 means no data.

SetMasterExternalPayload.description: Global master position from external source

SetOrientationExternalPayload.title: SetOrientationExternalPayload

orientation.description: Current orientation/compass heading (degrees). -1 means no orientation set

SetOrientationExternalPayload.description: Set current compass heading of ROV/locator

SetVehicleIMUExternalPayload.title: SetVehicleIMUExternalPayload

x.description: Current acceleration in x-axis of vehicle.

y.description: Current acceleration in y-axis of vehicle.

z.description: Current acceleration in z-axis of vehicle.

SetVehicleIMUExternalPayload.description: Set current rotation and acceleration of vehicle

position_valid.description: Is current position valid or not

receiver_distance.description: Measured distance to the locator for each receiver

receiver_valid.description: Is signal valid or not for each receiver

x.description: Current acoustic x position relative to master electronics (meter)

y.description: Current acoustic y position relative to master electronics (meter)

z.description: Current acoustic z position (depth) relative to master electronics (meter)

example.message: Non illo dolor illo facilis nihil nemo.
Non illo dolor illo facilis nihil nemo.

code.description: an application-specific error code, expressed as a string value.

detail.description: a human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
detail.example: Value of ID must be an integer

id.description: a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

meta.description: a meta object containing non-standard meta-information about the error.

status.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this problem, expressed as a string value.

example.detail: Value of ID must be an integer
